name: Life is Feudal: Forest Village
description: LiF:Forest Village is a city builder with survival aspects in a realistic harsh medieval world. Shape, build and expand your settlement, grow various food to prevent your villagers from avitaminosis and starvation. Possess them for additional micromanagement or simply to wander around.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (SP1) Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD FX-6300 with at least 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560/Radeon HD 6850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD FX-8350 with at least 2,5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 760/Radeon HD 6970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
